text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump An absolute coat-tail riding clown.  Daddy’s little boy whom would never make it out in the big scary unsympathetic land that is America. 1 million cases of COVID-19 next week and you clown are shooting giraffes with trust fund babies. 🦒 🦒
